description-en: Configure messages of this module here
description-de: Passe hier die Nachrichten des Modules an

content.default-en: This item could not be found
content.default-de: Dieses Item konnte nicht gefunden werden
content.description-en: The message that is send if the item wasn't found
content.description-de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn das Item nicht gefunden wird

content.default-en: You haven't enough money to buy this Item
content.default-de: Du hast nicht genug Geld, um dieses Item zu kaufen
content.description-en: The message that is send if the user haven't enough money to buy an item
content.description-de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn ein Benutzer nicht genug geld hat, um ein Item zu kaufen

params.name: %shopItems%
params.description-de: Items die aktuell im Shop verf√ºgbar sind

content.description-en: Message for the shop. The Items gets added at the end

content.description: This message gets send when a user is currently in cooldown
content.default: Please wait before using this command again

content.description: Array of messages from which one random gets send when a user works successfully

params.name: %earned%
params.description: Money that the user had earned

content.description: Array of messages from which one random gets send when a user commits a crime successfully
default: You stole a wallet and earned **%earned%**

params.name: %earned%
params.description: Money that the user had earned

content.description: Array of messages from which one random gets send when a user fails to do some crime
default: You've stolen a wallet and get caught.You loose **%loose%**

content.description: This message gets send when a user robs another user successfully

params.name: %earned%
params.description: Money that the user had earned

params.name: %user%
params.description: The user that gets robed by you

default.title: Leaderboard

params.name: %earned%

content.description: Message that gets send after the user has claimed the weekly reward

params.name: %earned%

params.name: %bank%
params.description: Current value that the user has on the bank

params.name: %user%
params.description: Username and discriminator of the User

content.description: The message that gets sent when the bot can't find a user
Message that gets send when a user buys something in the shop
Message that gets send when a new shop item gets created

params.name: %role%
params.description: Role that everyone gets who buys the item

content.description: Message that gets send when a new shop item gets deleted

content.description-en: The reply when a user deposits money to the bank
The reply when a user withdraws money from the bank
The message that gets sent on a message-drop
default-en: Message-Drop: You earned %earned% simply by chatting!

params.description-en: Amount of money that the user had erned

content.description-en: Message that gets send if the bot needs a number but gets something different
Message that gets send if a User trys to enable the Message-Drop message, but it's already enabled
content.default-en: The Mesage-Drop message is already enabled!

content.description-en: Message that gets send when a User enables the Message-Drop message
Message that gets send if a User trys to disable the Message-Drop message, but it's already disabled
content.default-en: The Mesage-Drop message is already disabled!

content.description-en: Message that gets send when a User disables the Message-Drop message
